name: umbrella-app
description: Example umbrella app arch on express

scripts.db:migrate: npm run env:dev -- npx prisma migrate dev --name
scripts.db:migrate:dev:rolled-back: npm run env:dev -- npx prisma migrate resolve --rolled-back
scripts.db:migrate:prod:rolled-back: npm run env:prod -- npx prisma migrate resolve --rolled-back
scripts.db:migrate:test:rolled-back: npm run env:test -- npx prisma migrate resolve --rolled-back
scripts.db:migrate:dev:applied: npm run env:dev -- npx prisma migrate resolve --applied
scripts.db:migrate:prod:applied: npm run env:prod -- npx prisma migrate resolve --applied
scripts.db:migrate:test:applied: npm run env:test -- npx prisma migrate resolve --applied
scripts.db:reset:dev: npm run env:dev -- npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.db:reset:test: npm run env:test -- npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.db:studio:dev: npm run env:dev -- npx prisma studio
scripts.db:studio:test: npm run env:test -- npx prisma studio
scripts.db:deploy:dev: npm run env:dev -- npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:deploy:prod: npm run env:prod -- npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:deploy:test: npm run env:test -- npx prisma migrate deploy
